OOC: I will not be doing that, because I want everyoen to read all of the p=
osts like I do. I read everyone's posts, so everyone should read mine, that=
's how I feel...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, October 14, 2000 8:39 PM
  Subject: Soon=
 To Meet With The Transformers/Die Torca!!


  This post regards these char=
acters      
   
  Chars Involved(Besides mine): Torca
   
  (I put this ju=
st incase anybody controlling the included characters misses this post, tha=
t way, instead of somebody missing a post which involves their char(s), the=
y can just read this part and say "Hey, this post involves me, I better rea=
d")
                              
  ::The Elements Group::
   
           =
  The plant command center was now 80% grown.  Ringalish=E9 then gave out a=
 command.
   
             "Listen, now, we will go and seek these "transfo=
rmers" the Abyss have spoke of.  Covertax, you and I will go search.  Alvat=
ar, I had intended to bring you, but, seeing that we are unable to provide =
structural defence, I want you to stay behind and defend the base.  Do you =
all understand?" He said.
   
             Alvatar nodded and said yes, the=
n got in a guard-like stance.
   
           Covertax grinned schemingly, a=
nd walked up to Ringalish=E9.  Covertax and Ringalish=E9 chose the element =
of air to help them travel, and before you could blink they gusted off like=
 wind, actually, as wind.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  :=
:Skulletron::
   
         Skulletron's anger spurt went off again.  He sto=
mped off towards Torca, mechfluid leaking as he went.  Then, he saw Torca t=
alking to whoever(Spears and Smokescreen?).
   
         Skulletron walked =
up to Torca, grabbed him by the neck, lifted him up, and squeezed superly d=
uperly hard, attempting to either choke him to death or crush his neck.

  =
      eGroups Sponsor
